longBusinessSummary: Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of paper and paper boards primarily in India. The company operates through Paper and Paper Board, and Trading of Plastic & Packaging Materials segments. It offers eco, chromo white back, eco-white, eco kraft back, and duplex coated boards. The company also trades plastic and packaging materials. It serves pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, health care products, ready made garments, food products, match boxes, and FMCG sectors. The company was formerly known as Nirvikara Paper Mills Limited. Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited was founded in 1975 and is based in Mumbai, India.
